trans-unit.source: Connect to SQL Database by using Node.js on Windows
trans-unit.target: Connect to SQL Database by using Node.js on Windows

trans-unit.source: Presents a Node.js code sample you can use to connect to Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Presents a Node.js code sample you can use to connect to Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: The sample runs on a Windows client computer.
trans-unit.target: The sample runs on a Windows client computer.

trans-unit.source: Connect to SQL Database by using Node.js on Windows
trans-unit.target: Connect to SQL Database by using Node.js on Windows

trans-unit.source: This topic presents a Node.js code sample that you can use to connect to Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: This topic presents a Node.js code sample that you can use to connect to Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: The Node.js program runs on a Windows client computer.
trans-unit.target: The Node.js program runs on a Windows client computer.

trans-unit.source: To manage the connection, the msnodesql driver is used.
trans-unit.target: To manage the connection, the msnodesql driver is used.

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requirements

trans-unit.source: The following software items must exist on your client development computer.
trans-unit.target: The following software items must exist on your client development computer.

trans-unit.source: Node.js – [Version 0.8.9 (32 bit version)](http://blog.nodejs.org/2012/09/11/node-v0-8-9-stable/).
trans-unit.target: Node.js – [Version 0.8.9 (32 bit version)](http://blog.nodejs.org/2012/09/11/node-v0-8-9-stable/).

trans-unit.source: Scroll and click the download for Window Installer for 32 bit x86, and not for Windows x64 Installer 64 bit.
trans-unit.target: Scroll and click the download for Window Installer for 32 bit x86, and not for Windows x64 Installer 64 bit.

trans-unit.source: [Python 2.7.6](https://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7.6/), the installer for either x86 or x64.
trans-unit.target: [Python 2.7.6](https://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7.6/), the installer for either x86 or x64.

trans-unit.source: [Visual C++ 2010](https://app.vssps.visualstudio.com/profile/review?download=true&family=VisualStudioCExpress&release=VisualStudio2010&type=web&slcid=0x409&context=eyJwZSI6MSwicGMiOjEsImljIjoxLCJhbyI6MCwiYW0iOjEsIm9wIjpudWxsLCJhZCI6bnVsbCwiZmEiOjAsImF1IjpudWxsLCJjdiI6OTY4OTg2MzU1LCJmcyI6MCwic3UiOjAsImVyIjoxfQ2) - the Express edition is freely available from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: [Visual C++ 2010](https://app.vssps.visualstudio.com/profile/review?download=true&family=VisualStudioCExpress&release=VisualStudio2010&type=web&slcid=0x409&context=eyJwZSI6MSwicGMiOjEsImljIjoxLCJhbyI6MCwiYW0iOjEsIm9wIjpudWxsLCJhZCI6bnVsbCwiZmEiOjAsImF1IjpudWxsLCJjdiI6OTY4OTg2MzU1LCJmcyI6MCwic3UiOjAsImVyIjoxfQ2) - the Express edition is freely available from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server Native Client 11.0 - available as Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Native Client found in the [SQL Server 2012 Feature Pack](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=29065).
trans-unit.target: SQL Server Native Client 11.0 - available as Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Native Client found in the [SQL Server 2012 Feature Pack](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=29065).

trans-unit.source: Install the required modules
trans-unit.target: Install the required modules

trans-unit.source: Once you satisfy the requirements, make sure you are on Node.js version 0.8.9.
trans-unit.target: Once you satisfy the requirements, make sure you are on Node.js version 0.8.9.

trans-unit.source: You can check this by using the following command from your command line terminal: node -v.
trans-unit.target: You can check this by using the following command from your command line terminal: node -v.

trans-unit.source: In a **cmd.exe** command line window, navigate to your project directory- for example C:\NodeJSSQLProject.
trans-unit.target: In a **cmd.exe** command line window, navigate to your project directory- for example C:\NodeJSSQLProject.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following commands in the sequence shown.
trans-unit.target: Enter the following commands in the sequence shown.

trans-unit.source: Next navigate to node_modules\msnodesql folder and run the **msnodesql-0.2.1-v0.8-ia32** executible.
trans-unit.target: Next navigate to node_modules\msnodesql folder and run the **msnodesql-0.2.1-v0.8-ia32** executible.

trans-unit.source: Follow the steps from the installation wizard and hit finish when you are done.
trans-unit.target: Follow the steps from the installation wizard and hit finish when you are done.

trans-unit.source: At this point you should have the Node.js SQL Server driver installed.
trans-unit.target: At this point you should have the Node.js SQL Server driver installed.

trans-unit.source: Follow the next steps to get your connection string and then you should be able to connect to Azure SQL DB from your Node.js application.
trans-unit.target: Follow the next steps to get your connection string and then you should be able to connect to Azure SQL DB from your Node.js application.

trans-unit.source: Create a database and retrieve your connection string
trans-unit.target: Create a database and retrieve your connection string

trans-unit.source: See the [Get Started topic](sql-database-get-started.md) to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.
trans-unit.target: See the [Get Started topic](sql-database-get-started.md) to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.

trans-unit.source: It is important you follow the guide to create an **AdventureWorks database template**.
trans-unit.target: It is important you follow the guide to create an **AdventureWorks database template**.

trans-unit.source: The samples shown below will only work with the **AdventureWorks schema**.
trans-unit.target: The samples shown below will only work with the **AdventureWorks schema**.

trans-unit.source: Connect to your SQL Database
trans-unit.target: Connect to your SQL Database

trans-unit.source: Copy the following code in a .js file located in your project directory.
trans-unit.target: Copy the following code in a .js file located in your project directory.

trans-unit.source: Now run your .js file by issuing the following command.
trans-unit.target: Now run your .js file by issuing the following command.

trans-unit.source: Execute an SQL SELECT statement
trans-unit.target: Execute an SQL SELECT statement

trans-unit.source: Insert a row, pass parameters, and retrieve the generated primary key
trans-unit.target: Insert a row, pass parameters, and retrieve the generated primary key

trans-unit.source: Transactions
trans-unit.target: Transactions

trans-unit.source: The method **conn.beginTransactions** will not work in Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The method **conn.beginTransactions** will not work in Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Instead, follow the code sample to perform transactions in SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Instead, follow the code sample to perform transactions in SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Stored procedures
trans-unit.target: Stored procedures

trans-unit.source: For this code sample to work, you must first have or create a stored procedure that inputs no parameters.
trans-unit.target: For this code sample to work, you must first have or create a stored procedure that inputs no parameters.

trans-unit.source: You can create a stored procedure with a tool such as SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS.exe).
trans-unit.target: You can create a stored procedure with a tool such as SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS.exe).
